versiondata.description: Add support for building and running Java LTS: 11, 17, and 21 apart from 8. As 'areca.bat', now 'areca.sh' works with 'JAVA_HOME' environment variable and embeded JRE/JDK. Sortable columns for 'Physical View', 'Logical View', 'History' and 'File Explorer'. Update and rename documentation folder to prepare 'GitHub Pages'. Change the URL of 'version.xml' to point to the areca-backup repo. Minor building pipeline improvements. Minor fixes.
